channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump admin sues over California law banning ICE from wearing face masks to shield identities
item.description: The Trump administration sued California over new law banning federal immigration agents from wearing masks, claiming the restrictions violate constit...

item.title: Drone tracking startup SkySafe will pay you crypto to buy and install its sensor
item.description: SkySafe is carving out a role as the FlightAware for drones and wants people to contribute to its network by buying a $949 sensor.

item.title: One man is responsible for the McDonald’s Dollar Menu, Pizza Hut’s stuffed crust, and Smashburger. Meet Tom Ryan
item.description: Ryan was a hitmaker everywhere he went, from Pizza Hut to Quiznos to McDonald's and beyond.

item.title: Marine veteran launches Senate campaign by invoking far-left radical to paint Dems as extreme
item.description: Political newcomer and former State Department expert David Williams enters race to unseat Democratic Sen. Mark Warner in Virginia's 2026 election.

item.title: Elon Musk revives billionaire beef with Bill Gates, says he better exit his ‘crazy short’ against Tesla soon or else add to his $1.5 billion in losses
item.description: “I cannot take your philanthropy on climate change seriously when you have a massive short position against Tesla,” Musk said at the time Gates made h...

item.title: House GOP braces for Epstein files vote as concerns remain despite Trump's green light
item.description: House Republicans express cautious support for bipartisan bill requiring DOJ to release Jeffrey Epstein files after President Donald Trump endorsed th...

item.title: ‘Trust is at an all-time low for both job seekers and recruiters’: Hiring platform CEO says talent acquisition is in an ‘AI doom loop’
item.description: The 2025 Greenhouse AI in Hiring Report found that only 8% of job seekers believe AI algorithms that screen initial applications make hiring fairer.

item.title: AOC distances herself from Hakeem Jeffries primary challenger
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez distanced herself from New York City Council member Chi Osse's effort to primary House Democratic Leader Hakeem Jeffries...

item.title: Florida Lt. Gov. Jay Collins appears to take shots at Trump-backed gubernatorial candidate Byron Donalds
item.description: Sunshine State Lt. Gov. Jay Collins seemed to take shots at President Donald Trump-backed Florida gubernatorial candidate Rep. Byron Donalds

item.title: Trust is the missing ingredient in the AI boom
item.description: There is a soft underbelly of the AI boom, a deep sense of unease about its employment effects and a lack of understanding of benefits to the consumer...

item.title: Arizona Republicans Introduce Constitutional Amendment To End Post-Election Day Counting ‘Chaos’
item.description: Arizona Republicans introduced a constitutional amendment proposal on Monday that seeks to help end the chaos and mismanagement in the state’s electio...

item.title: GOP Should Be More Concerned About Congress’s Failure To Deliver Trump’s Mandate Than Infighting
item.description: Republicans have a majority and are doing nothing with it.

item.title: Girls’ Steep Decline In Desire For Marriage Is The Destabilizing Consequence Of Feminization
item.description: Feminism, abortion, the decline in Christianity, the normalization of cohabitation, and rising divorce all played roles in this phenomenon.
